Text: Please, how will i get the subtitels into the movie???

Install VobSub and play it in Windows Media Player, and you must have the movie and subtitle file in the same folder!
You can get VobSub here: http://www.softpedia.com/get/Multimedia/Video/Codec-Packs-Video-Codecs/VobSub.shtml
